TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExpandableObjectConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供在可扩展对象与其他各种表示形式之间实现转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert expandable objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类将对对象属性的支持添加到提供的方法和属性。This class adds support for properties on an object to the methods and properties provided by . 若要使类型的属性在中可扩展, 请为 和的标准实现指定此类型。To make a type of property expandable in the , specify this for standard implementations of and . 使用标记子属性, 以确保控件中的行为正确。Mark child properties with the to ensure correct behavior in a control. > [!NOTE] > 永远不应直接访问类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 改为使用调用适当的转换器。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 有关详细信息, 请参阅基类中的示例。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 有关类型转换器的详细信息, 请参阅基类和[如何:实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将类型的变量转换为字符串变量。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string variable. [!code-cpp[Converters#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[Converters#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#26)] [!code-vb[Converters#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#26)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和类来创建自定义控件的可展开属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and the class to create an expandable property on a custom control. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter/CS/DemoControl.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter/VB/DemoControl.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, Attribute[] attributes);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, class System.Attribute[] attributes) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetProperties (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, value As Object, attributes As Attribute()) As PropertyDescriptorCollection

public: override System::ComponentModel::PropertyDescriptorCollection ^ GetProperties(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Object ^ value, cli::array <Attribute ^> ^ attributes);

param.name: context
param.span: 一个 ，用于提供格式上下文。

span.span: An that provides a format context.

param.name: value
param.span: 一个 ，它指定要获取其属性的对象类型。

span.span: An that specifies the type of object to get the properties for.

param.name: attributes
param.span: 一个将用作筛选器的 类型的数组。

span.span: An array of type that will be used as a filter.

summary.span: 获取由值参数指定的对象类型的属性集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of properties for the type of object specified by the value parameter.

returns.span: 具有为此组件公开的属性的 ；或者如果没有属性，则为 。

span.span: A with the properties that are exposed for the component, or if there are no properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. `attributes`数组将用于筛选数组。The `attributes` array will be used to filter the array. 可以混用和对象。 `attributes`The `attributes` can have a mix of and objects. 筛选由以下规则定义:Filtering is defined by the following rules: - 对象将被视为通配符; 它将匹配其特性集中具有的任何属性。 A object will be treated as a wildcard; it will match any property that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果某个属性不具有相同的类, 则该属性将不会包含在返回的数组中。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property will not be included in the returned array. - 如果该特性是的实例, 则该属性必须是完全匹配项, 否则不会包含在返回的数组中。If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match or it will not be included in the returned array. - 如果指定了实例并且它是默认属性, 则即使属性中没有的实例, 它也将包含在返回的数组中。If a instance is specified and it is the default property, it will be included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the property.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this object supports properties using the specified context.

returns.span: 由于应调用 来查找此对象的属性，因此为 。

span.span: because should be called to find the properties of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
